**2023 Odisha Train Collision**

The 2023 Odisha train collision occurred on 2 June 2023, in Balasore district, Odisha, India. [4]

On 2 June 2023, three trains collided in Balasore district in the east Indian state of Odisha. The accident occurred around 19:00 IST when Coromandel Express, a passenger train, collided with a stationary goods train near Bahanaga Bazar railway station on the Howrah-Chennai main line.

search_results.description: Railways report on Odisha train tragedy reveals what caused crash ...
snippets: The Ministry also said of the 295 who died from the triple-train crash, 41 have still not been identified. The ministry accepted that signalling failures have happened in the past, but did not provide details, only saying none of those instances could have led to an incident as serious as the one in Odisha.
